cmput301w16t08.scaling_pancake.models

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301w16t08.scaling_pancake.models.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    User is meant to represent a user, and contains lists of Instruments he owns and has borrowed, as well as pending Bids. It is basically a wrapper around an ArrayList .
    See Also:
    Instrument, Bid

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      User(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String email)
      Creates a new user with username name and email email, and assigns it a unique id
      User(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String id, boolean newBid)
      Creates a new user with username name and email email and id id
